name: Senior Front-end engineer
description:
Early-stage startup creates a no-code process automation SaaS for modern teams and looking for a Senior JavaScript developer. The company offers a lot of freedom and responsibility for making technological decisions.

Technology stack:

  • Back-end API: Java 13, Spring Boot 2.2.5, MySQL 8.
  • Web Front-end: Node.js, Express 4, React 16.13, Redux, Thunk, Emotion, Webpack with Babel.
  • DevOps: AWS, Docker, Jenkins, Nexus, MBT, Terraform.

What we offer:

  • Modern tech stack which you are encouraged to actively influence: Typescript, React, Redux with redux-toolkit, logux, webpack, nodejs with express.
  • Startup atmosphere with fast decision-making, lots of autonomy and no bureaucracy.
  • Ability to participate in product discussions and shaping priorities.
  • Trust-based work relationship with flexibility to choose your working rhythm.
  • Competitive compensation.

We are looking for:

  • First and foremost: A friendly, humble and ambitious character fitting our company culture.
  • Having worked extensively in a senior frontend engineering position before.
  • Strong experience with Typescript, HTML, CSS.
  • Strong experience with React incl. hooks.
  • Strong experience with Redux and its ecosystem.
  • Experience of building single-page applications and optimizing performance and memory.
  • Fluent written and spoken English.
  • Experience with building real-time collaborative applications, operational transformation or CRDTs as a strong plus.
  • Experience with websockets and data-sync across clients as a strong plus.
  • Experience with building code editors (specifically with the help of CodeMirror) and handling isolated execution of user-generated JS snippets as a strong plus.
